def_cn: (戏剧、电影)剧本;(电视节目)广播稿
def_en: The script of a play, film, or television programme is the written version of it.

def_cn: 为(电影等)写剧本;为(广播、电视节目)撰稿
def_en: The person who scripts a film or a radio or television play writes it.

def_cn: (一种语言的)书写系统，字母表
def_en: You can refer to a particular system of writing as a particular script .
If you say that something which has happened is not in the script, or that someone has not followed the script, you mean that something has happened which was not expected or intended to happen.
